definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Lilies are whitest in a blackamoor's hand.
sentences.chinese: 黑人手中的百合花最白。

sentences.english: Karen plants beautiful roses and lilies in her garden.
sentences.chinese: 凱倫在她的花園裏頭種滿了美麗的玫瑰和百合花。
爲什麼傻畢利喜歡百合花？

sentences.english: His smile like a forest at the end of the sunflower fields and lilies.
sentences.chinese: 他的笑容像是森林盡頭的向日葵田與百合花。

sentences.english: Software Description: About Safeway Flowers IV, This is an extreme close-up of a lily.
sentences.chinese: 這是一朵百合花的一個極度的特寫鏡頭。

sentences.english: Within the 27)marshy reeds and lilies of the waterway, a 28)hippopotamus bubbled.
sentences.chinese: 在長滿蘆葦和百合花的沼澤中，一隻河馬在噴着水泡。

sentences.english: And, like a wither'd lily, on the land.
sentences.chinese: 宛若是一支百合花已然枯蔫。

sentences.english: The lily smiled at Shandie the bumble bee.
sentences.chinese: 澄色百合花對著小蜜蜂仙蒂微笑著。

sentences.english: I grow orchids , chrysanthemums , lilies and cactuses .
sentences.chinese: 我種蘭花，菊花，百合花和仙人掌。

sentences.english: Aromas of roses, white flowers (lily) and red fruits were released just one hour after decanting.
sentences.chinese: 在開瓶醒一小時後有玫瑰香，白百合花香和紅果香。

sentences.english: I take my white-lily bouquet. He holds my arm and walk down the aisle.
sentences.chinese: 我拿這百合花球，他挽着我步出走道。

sentences.english: Our most elegant flower is Golden Lily.
sentences.chinese: 我們最優雅的花是金百合花。
“那隻獨角獸，”他說道，“吃了一朵百合花。”

sentences.english: It was marriage sublimated; these two children were two lilies.
sentences.chinese: 這是崇高的結合，這兩個孩子是兩朵百合花。

sentences.english: As a lily among thorns, So is my love among the daughters.
sentences.chinese: 我的佳偶在女子中，好像百合花在荊棘中。

sentences.english: As a lily among brambles , so is my love among maidens.
sentences.chinese: 正像荊棘裏的一朵百合花。
